Pianolibrary.org is looking for contributors.

Back to Works by composer

Domenico Scarlatti

1685–1757

Works overview · Works by difficulty · Recommended editions

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Works are identified by the numbering of Ralph Kirkpatrick. See also a summary of sources, sonatas ordered by the Kirkpatrick numbering, sonatas ordered by the Fadini numbering, sonatas ordered by the Longo numbering, sonatas ordered by the Pestelli numbering, and sonatas ordered by key.

  • Sonatas not numbered by Kirkpatrick
  • There are many sonatas not numbered by Kirkpatrick, either because he considered them spurious or because he did not know about them. For further details, see the summary of sources for the sonatas.
